description: Three rugged, bearded men resembling frontiersmen or mountain men sit around a small table with mugs. The scene depicts figures associated with the American wilderness engaged in a simple, domestic act, creating a contrast between their legendary images and the mundane setting. The juxtaposition of the evocative names Buffalo Bill and Grizzly Adams with the decidedly less imposing Pigeon Jones highlights the absurdity of expecting all individuals in such a group to possess equally impressive monikers.
caption: Buffalo Bill, Grizzly Adams, and Pigeon Jones
